channel.title: 4DN News and Announcements

item.title: Two protocols approved by the Steering Committee this month are available on the 4DN Portal Protocol Repository!
item.description: 4DN Steering Committee has approved two protocols: 1) iMARGI - protocol for mapping of chromatin-associated RNAs, 2) PLAC-seq/HiChIP/in situ ChIA-PET - protocols to detect and quantify chromatin contacts anchored at genomic regions associated with specific DNA binding proteins or histone modifications.

item.title: 4DN Directory system launched!
item.description: 4DN OH has developed and deployed 4DN Directory, a centralized and integrated system for all 4DN personnel information where members can access the information of all 4DN members.
